results.title: Fertilization and birth
results.creator_credit: Curtis Avery and Wexler Film Productions
results.brief_description: Uses animation and live action to describe for young children the reproductive processes from fertilization to birth in fish, birds, animals, and humans. Includes birth sequences of puppies and farm animals. Suitable for primary level.

results.title: Ferris Bueller's day off [DVD]
results.creator_credit: John Hughes, Tom Jacobson and Paramount Pictures
results.brief_description: A 1961 Ferrari 250 GT California. It was one man’s love, his passion, and his fault he didn’t lock the garage when Ferris Bueller wanted the day off. One day, towards the end of his senior year, Ferris (Matthew Broderick), cuts school and heads for downtown Chicago with his girl Sloane and his best friend Cameron, to show what a little ingenuity, a lot of nerve, and a red Ferrari can do. From John Hughes comes a contemporary comedy which follows Ferris’ wildly audacious and nearly flawless plan to take it easy. Featuring a soundtrack from artists including Yello, Big Audio Dynamite, Sigue Sigue Sputnik, The Beat, The Beatles and The Dream Academy. Also stars Alan Ruck and Mia Sara. Cinematography, Tak Fujimoto. Script, John Hughes.

results.title: Ferret keeping
results.brief_description: This video covers the basics of ferret management and breeding for those keeping ferrets for working, racing, or as pets. Advice on choosing a ferret, types of housing, and what to feed them. The video follows a kit (baby ferret), from birth to its care at different ages, and covers how to train, handle and breed. The video explores the myth of ferrets being aggressive animals, revealing how engaging and good-natured they can be. Presented by James McKay, zoologist, writer, broadcaster, and internationally acknowledged as one of the world’s leading authorities on ferrets.

results.title: FernGully: the Last rainforest (Captioned)
results.creator_credit: Bill Kroyer, Peter Faiman, Wayne Young, Youngheart Productions and FAI Films
results.brief_description: Dedicated to “our children and our children’s children”, the magical, mystical world of Fern Gully, the last rainforest takes us to a secret, special place filled with wonder and adventure where human beings exist only in fairy tales! Human hero Zak, shrunk to fairy size by Crysta, joins Batty Koda, an escapee from human lab and the denizens of the forest as they struggle to save the future of the forest from the evil enemy Hexxus. Voices include Tim Curry, Christian Slater and Robin Williams.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Bill Kroyer, Peter Faiman, Wayne Young, Youngheart Productions and FAI Films

results.title: FernGully: The Last Rainforest
results.creator_credit: Kroyer Films, Youngheart Productions, FAI Films, 20th Century Fox, Diana Young, Peter Faiman, Jim Cox, Bill Kroyer and Wayne Young
results.headline_credit: Australia and United States of America, 1992
results.brief_description: When a sprite named Crysta shrinks a human boy, Zak, down to her size, he vows to help the magical fairy folk stop a greedy logging company from destroying their home: the pristine rainforest known as FernGully. Zak and his new friends fight to defend FernGully from lumberjacks — and the vengeful spirit they accidentally unleash after chopping down a magic tree.

constellations_other.name: There is no Planet B
constellations_other.description: While the climate emergency is very real, inspiring thousands and thousands of students to strike, documentaries, animated movies and dystopian genre films have warned about a world ravaged by global warming.

results.title: Fern the Red Deer (Captioned)
results.brief_description: A marvellous adventure story, filmed on location in remote Exmoor, about an abandoned deer calf. The deer calf forms a bond with two young children and together they fight for the wild deer’s survival. Rated: G

results.title: Fergi builds a business: Fergi goes inc.
results.creator_credit: John Cosgrove, Dan Gomez, Walt Disney Educational Media Company and Dave Bell Associates
